data.name: The Legend of Question 6
data.description:
Jakob is Matematic and he want to solve Question 6 and get as much as posible numbers in it. Let's help him to solve it...

Question 6 is matematic problem.

To solve it you will use this equation:
```math
{ a^2 + b^2 \over ab + 1 } = x^2
```
This will work only if number x is Integer.

### Better explanation
- [You can find here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Y30VF3cSIYQ&list=RDCMUCoxcjq-8xIDTYp3uz647V5A&index=5)
- [what numbers are there](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L0Vj_7Y2-xY) 

or if you like wiki: 
- [Vieta jumping](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vieta_jumping)

### What we want to do?
Create function that will return array of Strings like this and will take start and end positions:
- [%5d, %5d] = %3d" => a, b = (a * a + b * b) / (a * b + 1)

### Exaples:
getNumbers(0, 1) wil look \
"[0, 0] = 0"

getNumbers(1,10) will look \
"[1, 1] = 1" \
"[2, 8] = 4" \
"[8, 2] = 4"
